cz.artin.hackathon.simulator

Interface Driver


  • public interface Driver
    Car driving interface. You should implement it to drive your car. Choose any name and any color. The car it will drive will have the color of your team and roof of the color of the driver.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enterRace(Way way)
      Called before the race starts to inform the driver about the track.
      cz.artin.hackathon.simulator.CarColor getColor()
      Color for the roof of the car.
      Drive getDrive(CarInfo self, java.util.List<CarInfo> cars)
      Called regularly to inform the driver about the situation and ask for instructions.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Name of the driver, used in the race results table.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Name of the driver, used in the race results table.

      • getColor

        cz.artin.hackathon.simulator.CarColor getColor()
        Color for the roof of the car.

      • enterRace

        void enterRace(Way way)
        Called before the race starts to inform the driver about the track. You should save it in the driver.
        Parameters:
        way - the way you'll ride

      • getDrive

        Drive getDrive(CarInfo self,
               java.util.List<CarInfo> cars)
        Called regularly to inform the driver about the situation and ask for instructions.
        Parameters:
        self - car info of the car you're driving
        cars - car infos of the other cars
        Returns:
        drive command for the car you're driving
